text: Dimitrios Pandermalis (; 1940 â€“ 14 September 2022) was a Greek archaeologist. He was professor of archaeology at the Aristotle University of Thessaloniki. He worked on the archaeological sites of Dion and Pieria. He also worked for the Acropolis Museum. He died on 14 September 2022, at the age of 82. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Greek scientists Category:Archaeologists Category:Greek academics
title: Dimitrios Pandermalis
